,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px 0'},children:[renderContent(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"qr-reader-container",ref:readerRef,style:{width:'100%',minHeight:'250px',border:error?'2px dashed #ff4d4f':'2px dashed #d9d9d9',borderRadius:'8px',marginTop:'16px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{type:"secondary",style:{display:'block',textAlign:'center',marginTop:'16px'},children:"\uD83D\uDCA1 H\u1ED7 tr\u1EE3 qu\xE9t: QR Code & Barcode"})]})});};export default QRScanner;
